formatDescription: xdomea is an XML interface for the exchange of documents, cases, and records, typically used by digital record management systems in Germany. Schema files are available here: https://www.xrepository.de/api/xrepository/urn:xoev-de:xdomea:kosit:standard:xdomea_3.0.0:xmlschema
formatProvenance: v. 120- Links in description updated to correspond to specification in notes. Submitted by Landesarchiv Nordrhein-Westfalen.

internalSignatures.name: xdomea v.3.0.0
internalSignatures.note: ASCII header: XML declaration <?xml version="1.0" (alternatively with single quotes), followed by up to 320 arbitrary bytes (rest of XML declaration + possible whitespace, comments etc.), followed by xdomea namespace declaration xmlns:xdomea="urn:xoev-de:xdomea:schema:3.0.0" (alternatively with single quotes). The prefix xdomea is mandatory as per the specification, page 75.
